T.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid

F.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID left join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productid

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productmodelid and pm.productmodelid = p.productid

select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID left join productmodel pm on pm.productmodelid = p.productid
